messages.title: LET'S UNLEASH BRITAIN'S POTENTIAL
messages.content: Let's get Brexit done. Let's get on with the country's priorities.

messages.title: OUR ECONOMY CAN'T AFFORD MORE UNCERTAINTY WITH A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: Labour can't win a majority. But Jeremy Corbyn could still become Prime Minister. Propped up by smaller parties like Nicola Sturgeon's SNP. That means more uncertainty for the Brexit arguments. And another Scottish independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More funding for every pupil in every school
£3.6 billion to help towns invest and attract new businesses
30 million more trees for cleaner air
Gigabit broadband for the whole country

mentions.tacticalSituation: Preventing a hung parliament and securing a majority government.

issues.economy: Labour's economic plans described as damaging, claims about massive taxes on businesses with Corbyn's plans.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school
issues.environment: 30 million more trees for cleaner air
issues.health: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS, 40 new hospitals across the country

endorsements.endorsement: Jeremy Corbyn's hard-left pregramme will wreck the UK economy
Labour plans 'crack the foundations of our economy'
Hung parliament sinks business confidence, IoD finds
